All - Download Document.description: This API is used to Download Document

All - Get additional late fee breakup.description: This API will help taxpayer to fetch the break up of the additonal late fee posted in their current return period

All - Get File Details.description: This API is called with the file_num to get the file URL

All - GET PREFERENCE.description: API call to get preference for taxpayers

All - Get Return Status.description: This API is to get the status of the Returns submitted

All - Get User Masters.description: This API will be used by G2B to Get the User Masters - Products and Supplier Recipients

All - GetDocStatus.description: This API is used to GetDocStatus

All - Late Fee.description: This API is to get the details of late fee levied in GSTR3B and GSTR4

All - New Proceed to File(for GSTR6,GSTR.description: This API will be used for proceed to file a particular return.

All - Proceed to File.description: This API is for proceeding to file GSTR data

All - SAVE PREFERENCE.description: API call to save preference for taxpayers

All - Save User Masters.description: This API will be used by G2B to Save or Update or Delete the User Masters - Products and Supplier Recipients and will return the saved details and the errored out details.

All - Signed PDF.description: API call for getting Signed PDF for a return period.

All - Upload Document.description: This API is used to Upload Document

CC - Create Notification.description: Used by CommunicationChannel for CC - Create Notification

CC - Delete Notifications By Ids.description: Used by CommunicationChannel for CC - Delete Notifications By Ids

CC - Get All Notifications.description: Used by CommunicationChannel for CC - Get All Notifications

CC - Get Notification By Id.description: Used by CommunicationChannel for CC - Get Notification By Id

CC - Reply Notification.description: Used by CommunicationChannel for CC - Reply Notification

CMP - File CMP.description: This API is to File CMP08.

CMP - Get Details.description: API call for getting CMP Details.

CMP - Save.description: API call for saving CMP records.

CMP - Validate Turnover.description: This API is to validate turnover for CMP08.

GSTR1 - File Gstr1.description: This API is to submit the GSTR1 return.

GSTR1 - Generate Summary.description: This API is to generate the table wise summary of GSTR1 data.

GSTR1 - Get AT.description: API call for getting advance tax details for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get ATA.description: API call for getting amended advance tax details for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2B Invoices.description: API call for getting all B2B invoices for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2BA Invoices.description: API call for getting all B2B amended invoices for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2CL Invoices.description: API call for getting all B2C Large invoices for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2CLA Invoices.description: API call for getting all B2C Large invoices with amendments for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2CS Invoices.description: This API will be used for getting all B2C HSN data for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get B2CSA Invoices.description: This API will be used for getting all B2CSA HSN data for a return period.

GSTR1 - Get CDNR Invoices.description: This API will call CDNR for getting all Credit/Debit notes for a return period of Registered Users.

GSTR1 - Get CDNRA Invoices.description: This API will call CDNRA for getting all amended Credit/Debit notes for a return period of Registered Users.

GSTR1 - Get CDNUR Invoices.description: This API will call CDNUR for getting all Credit/Debit notes for Unregistered Users

GSTR1 - Get CDNURA Invoices.description: This API will call CDNURA for getting all amended Credit/Debit notes for Unregistered Users

GSTR1 - Get Doc Issued.description: This API calls to get Documents issued during the tax period.

GSTR1 - Get ECOM Invoices.description: This API is to get ECOM Details
